title: Status Info
name: statusInfo
description: A class containing information about the status of the transaction.

properties.name: cancelAllowed
properties.description: A bool representing if the card reader will accept a cancel request.

properties.name: status
properties.description: A Status enum representing the status of the transaction.

properties.name: message
properties.description: A String containing the status message of the transaction.

properties.name: deviceStatus
properties.description: A DeviceStatus object containing information about the device.
